official-title.#text:
Establishing the Special Committee on
		  Sexual Assault and Abuse in the Armed Forces to conduct oversight, ensure
		  accountability, and report on the activities of the Department of Defense to
		  prevent, reduce, prosecute, and provide victims’ services for cases of sexual
		  assault and abuse in the Armed Forces.
